<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2227601ZEX-32_1_HTM_KI13701_EXHIBIT_32_1">
</A>
<A NAME="A2227601ZEX-32_1_HTM_TOC_KI13701_1">
</A>
<BR>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;32.1
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2227601ZEX-32_1_HTM_KI13701_CERTIFICATION_PURSUANT_TO_18_U__CER03819">
</A>
<A NAME="A2227601ZEX-32_1_HTM_TOC_KI13701_2">
</A>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,
<BR>
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
<BR>
	SECTION&nbsp;906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In connection with the Annual Report of InVivo Therapeutics Holdings Corp. (the "Company") on Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended
	December&nbsp;31, 2015 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the "Report"), I, Mark D. Perrin, Chief Executive Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18
	U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<DL COMPACT>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	(1)
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	The
	Report fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	(2)
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	The
	information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</DD>
</DL>
</UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A
	signed original of this written statement required by Section&nbsp;906 has been provided to the Company and will be retained by the Company and furnished to the Securities and
	Exchange Commission or its staff upon request.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING:0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;WIDTH:80%;MARGIN-LEFT:10%;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
</P>

<TR>
<!-- TABLE COLUMN WIDTHS SET -->

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="12PT" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</TD>
<!-- TABLE COLUMN WIDTHS END -->
</TR>

<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2227601ZEX-32_2_HTM_KK13701_EXHIBIT_32_2">

<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;32.2
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_4"></A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
<A NAME="A2227601ZEX-32_2_HTM_KK13701_CERTIFICATION_PURSUANT_TO_18_U__CER03819">
</A>
<A NAME="A2227601ZEX-32_2_HTM_TOC_KK13701_2">
</A>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2>
<B>
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,
<BR>
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
<BR>
	SECTION&nbsp;906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002
<BR>
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In connection with the Annual Report of InVivo Therapeutics Holdings Corp. (the "Company") on Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended
	December&nbsp;31, 2015 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the "Report"), I, Steven F. McAllister, Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to
	18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</FONT>
</P>
<UL>
<DL COMPACT>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	(1)
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	The
	Report fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
<BR>
<BR>
</FONT>
</DD>
<DT STYLE='FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;MARGIN-BOTTOM:-11PT;'>
<FONT SIZE=2>
	(2)
</FONT>
</DT>
<DD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	The
	information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</DD>
</DL>
</UL>
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
<FONT SIZE=2>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A
	signed original of this written statement required by Section&nbsp;906 has been provided to the Company and will be retained by the Company and furnished to the Securities and
	Exchange Commission or its staff upon request.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="PADDING:0PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;WIDTH:80%;MARGIN-LEFT:10%;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
</P>
